item.title: OS X - Enable access for assistive devices via the command line
item.description: This command enables access for assistive devices on Apple OS X machines via the command line. This is needed for software like SpectacleApp or SizeUp. This article has methods for OS X Mavericks 10.9 as for 10.8 and 10.7
